body:
Do People remember? that THE AVICUS NETWORK has Plug.DJ?
Well I am reminding you that AVICUS does have it!

AVICUS PLUG.DJ: http://plug.dj/avicus/ (AVICUS NETWORK Radio) Hosted by Howseh

                                               
                                                        Features
  • Get to Listen to MUSIC!
  • You could be the DJ!
  • Listen to music!
  • Meet & Spend time with Others!
  • Endless Entertainment!
                                                 Come Join Us Now!

title: Avicus - Plug.DJ

replies.body:
That. Bump.

I don't go on because other people don't go on. If others would join, I'd be happy to play some music.

replies.body: I know why nobody go on at Plug.dj! There is the site update, very very big. They work now more than 3 weeks on it! The bad thing is the points and playlist weren't updated, so they will deleted. here is the link: http://blog.plug.dj/2014/08/maintenance-site-update/
